name: Handy Andy
overview: In the darkness of the General Store around midnight something stirs. Andy the Caretaker works busily. The toys begin to play; the bottles begin to sing. But the Dolls have decided they want more, they want to show the world what they can do. The Dolls begin to march out of the store. Fearing for his beloved Sore, Andy tries again and again to stop them whilst trying to avoid the night-time frolics of the other goods.
